mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS user_id, l.lv_idx, l.lv_name, l.lv_icon, p.intro FROM member m JOIN level l ON m.lv_idx = l.lv_idx LEFT JOIN profile p ON m.id = p.id WHERE m.id = #{id}

SELECT m.id, m.lv_idx, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post p WHERE p.id = m.id) AS post_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.id = m.id) AS comment_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM timeline tl WHERE tl.time_user_id = m.id) AS timeline_count, (SELECT COUNT(ly.post_idx) FROM likeyn ly JOIN post p ON ly.post_idx = p.post_idx WHERE p.id = m.id AND ly.like_type = 1 ) AS like_count, pr.access_cnt AS access_count FROM member m LEFT JOIN profile pr ON m.id = pr.id WHERE m.id = #{id}
